meanings.definition: A white, crystalline compound used as a moth repellent.
meanings.sent1: I placed paradichlorobenzene in my closet to keep moths away.
meanings.sent2: The paradichlorobenzene effectively repelled the moths from my clothes.
meanings.sent3: The moths were so scared of paradichlorobenzene, they flew away in a hurry!
meanings.sent4: The paradichlorobenzene stood guard in the closet, warding off any moth invaders.
meanings.sent5: The smell of paradichlorobenzene was strong, ensuring no moths dared to come near.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound with the formula C6H4Cl2.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of paradichlorobenzene in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Paradichlorobenzene is commonly used in various chemical processes.
meanings.sent3: When mixed with other compounds, paradichlorobenzene created a colorful reaction.
meanings.sent4: The formula of paradichlorobenzene intrigued the researchers, leading to new discoveries.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the structure of paradichlorobenzene was fascinating to observe.
